## ProgressIndicatorService.addMessage() method

Adds message to progress indicator group

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addMessage(name: string, message?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of progress group (separate counter) |
|  message | <code>string</code> | Message to display what is happening |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
